TopicTitle: Go round the planet without going over 700m. The rocket you make can't use mods.

Articles.Content: I guess we really need a 'try-it-yourself-first' rule in Challenges section.
Its definately possible with C7... but stock is a different story all together...

Its definately possible with C7... but stock is a different story all together...

I think it could be done with enough winglets and a SAS module, but you\'re massively cheating the aerodynamics system to make it work. Ornithopters like that should not work.

I think it could be done with enough winglets and a SAS module, but you\'re massively cheating the aerodynamics system to make it work. Ornithopters like that should not work.

You can\'t really harness kinetic energy yet for that purpose, but you can easily cheat by making a magic turbine.

You can\'t really harness kinetic energy yet for that purpose, but you can easily cheat by making a magic turbine.

I\'ve used winglets in C7 to fly forever combined with ASAS and 2x warp. I think you could do it with stock parts. Just not sure how.
